sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import FadeInSection from "./FadeIn"; // icons import iconDown from "../icons/chevrons-down.svg"; import iconRight from "../icons/chevrons-right.svg"; import buttonIconRight from "../icons/button-right.svg"; import buttonIconLeft from "../icons/button-left.svg"; const EmployeeDetails = (props) => { useEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); }, []); const history = useHistory(); const tabs = ["BASIC INFORMATION", "EXPECTATIONS", "SOCIAL MEDIA"]; const [active, setActive] = useState("info"); return ( <>

Find Your Ideal Employer

Seeking for a suitable family to work for? We strive to help you find you the most suitable employer.

COMPLETE YOUR DETAILS
setActive("info")} className={`tab ${active === "info" ? "active" : ""}`} > BASIC INFORMATION setActive("expec")} className={`tab ${active === "expec" ? "active" : ""}`} > EXPECTATIONS setActive("social")} className={`tab ${active === "social" ? "active" : ""}`} > SOCIAL MEDIA
Full Name *
Date of Birth *
Nationality *
